requirements.summary: Implement user authentication UI with account creation and login functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Users can create new accounts with required fields
Users can log in with their credentials
Authentication state persists across sessions

file_operations.description: Create login/logout button component using Internet Identity authentication. Use the authorization component to handle authentication flows. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create modal for first-time user profile setup that prompts for user name. Use the authorization component's getCallerUserProfile and saveCallerUserProfile methods. Show this modal only when user is authenticated but has no profile. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create custom hook to fetch current user profile with proper loading states to prevent modal flash. Use the authorization component pattern for profile fetching. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create custom hook to save user profile using React Query mutation. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add authentication state checks, profile setup modal, and conditional rendering to show app content only when user is authenticated and has profile. Wire the LoginButton component into the main app layout.

requirements.summary: Create TRC20 withdrawal interface with 20 USDT minimum limit and request tracking
acceptanceCriteria: Withdrawal interface accepts TRC20 wallet addresses only
System enforces 20 USDT minimum withdrawal limit
Withdrawal requests are stored and tracked with status

file_operations.description: Create withdrawal form with TRC20 wallet address input and amount field. Enforce 20 USDT minimum through form validation. Display TRC20 badge using frontend/public/assets/generated/trc20-badge.dim_128x128.png. Call requestWithdrawal backend method on submission. Show validation errors for invalid addresses or amounts below minimum.

Create component to display user's withdrawal requests with status (pending, approved, rejected). Fetch data using getTransactions backend method. Show transaction ID, amount, wallet address, and current status for each withdrawal.
Create mutation hook for submitting withdrawal requests using requestWithdrawal backend method. Handle success and error states.
Create query hook to fetch user's withdrawal transactions using getTransactions backend method.
Create withdrawal page that combines WithdrawalForm and WithdrawalHistory components. Require user authentication and approval to access this page.
Add route for /withdrawal page and include navigation link in the app menu/sidebar for authenticated users to access withdrawal functionality.

requirements.summary: Build mining interface with automatic start functionality and earnings tracking at 2 USDT per day
acceptanceCriteria: Mining start button triggers automatic mining process
Mining duration can be set between 1-5 days
System calculates and tracks earnings at 2 USDT per day rate
Mining runs automatically once started without manual intervention

file_operations.description: Create mining control panel with start button and duration selector (1-5 days). Display mining icon using frontend/public/assets/generated/mining-icon.dim_256x256.png. Show current mining status, elapsed time, and calculated earnings (2 USDT per day). Call startMining backend method with selected duration. Display real-time countdown and earnings accumulation during active mining.
Create component to display mining task details including start time, duration, current state, and earnings progress. Show visual progress bar for active mining tasks.
Create mutation hook for starting mining tasks using startMining backend method. Accept duration parameter (1-5 days).
Create query hook to fetch user's mining tasks using getMiningTasks backend method. Enable polling to update active mining status in real-time.
Create mining page that combines MiningPanel and MiningStatus components. Show user's current balance from profile. Require user authentication and approval to access.
Add route for /mining page and include navigation link to mining functionality in the app menu for authenticated users.

requirements.summary: Create admin panel for managing withdrawal approvals and rejections
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can view all pending withdrawal requests
Admin can approve withdrawal requests
Admin can reject withdrawal requests with reason
Users see updated withdrawal status after admin action

file_operations.description: Create admin component to display all withdrawal requests with user details, amounts, and wallet addresses. Fetch data using getAllTransactions backend method. Include approve and reject action buttons for each pending request. Use the authorization component to verify admin role. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create query hook to fetch all withdrawal transactions using getAllTransactions backend method (admin only).
Create mutation hook for approving withdrawals using approveWithdrawal backend method (admin only).
Create mutation hook for rejecting withdrawals using rejectWithdrawal backend method (admin only).

Create admin component to display all users awaiting approval. Use the user-approval component's listApprovals method. Show approve/reject actions for each pending user. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create query hook to fetch user approval list using listApprovals backend method (admin only). Use the user-approval component. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create mutation hook for setting user approval status using setApproval backend method (admin only). Use the user-approval component. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create admin dashboard page that combines AdminWithdrawalQueue and AdminUserApprovalList components. Add tabs or sections for withdrawal management and user approval management. Guard access to admins only using the authorization component. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add route for /admin page and include conditional navigation link visible only to admin users in the app menu.

requirements.summary: Integrate Telegram channel follow flow with 1.5 USDT bonus reward
acceptanceCriteria: Telegram channel link is prominently displayed with follow prompt
System awards 1.5 USDT bonus to user account after following confirmation
Bonus is added to user's mining balance

file_operations.description: Create card component that displays Telegram channel link (https://t.me/Goldhunterfx345) with call-to-action button. Show 1.5 USDT bonus incentive. Include external link button to open Telegram channel and confirmation button to claim bonus. Call linkTelegram backend method after user confirms following. Hide card once user has already followed (check telegramFollowed in profile).
Create mutation hook for confirming Telegram follow using linkTelegram backend method. Invalidate user profile query after successful claim to refresh balance.

Create main dashboard page that displays user balance, mining summary, and TelegramFollowCard (if not yet followed). Show quick access links to mining and withdrawal pages. This serves as the landing page after authentication.
Add route for /dashboard and set it as the default authenticated route. Include navigation link to dashboard in app menu.

requirements.summary: Design professional landing page with cryptocurrency mining themed background
acceptanceCriteria: Landing page has professional cryptocurrency/mining themed design
Background uses high-quality imagery that looks authentic
Layout is clear and guides users to main actions (sign up, start mining)

file_operations.description: Create hero section component for landing page with headline, subheadline, and call-to-action buttons (Login/Get Started). Use frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png as the background image with overlay for text readability. Include project name 'Crypto Mining Hub' prominently in the hero text.

Create features section highlighting key platform capabilities: automatic mining (2 USDT/day), TRC20 withdrawals (20 USDT min), and Telegram bonus (1.5 USDT). Use card layout with icons and descriptions.
Create landing page that combines LandingHero and FeatureSection components. Display this page for unauthenticated users. Include LoginButton in header.

Add global theme styling for cryptocurrency/mining aesthetic using dark color scheme with accent colors (blue, green, cyan). Define typography styles, spacing utilities, and ensure responsive design foundations.

Set LandingPage as the root route for unauthenticated users. Add conditional routing to show LandingPage when not authenticated and DashboardPage when authenticated. Implement main app layout with header, navigation, and content area.
